trans-unit.source: Represents security information for client application services, which includes role information.
trans-unit.target: Representa informações de segurança para serviços do aplicativo cliente, que inclui informações de função.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando você validar um usuário nos serviços de aplicativo cliente, o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>ou o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>define o `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade a uma instância desta classe.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: O que <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>inicializa a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>propriedade para uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>classe.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>objeto retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: You will not typically access this class directly.
trans-unit.target: Você não geralmente acessará essa classe diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você chamará o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>método o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a ClientRolePrincipal reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode converter o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>valor da propriedade para uma referência de ClientRolePrincipal para chamar o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>método explicitamente, conforme demonstrado na seção de exemplo.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property is initialized with the value of the `identity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>propriedade é inicializada com o valor de `identity` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando você validar um usuário nos serviços de aplicativo cliente, o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>ou o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>define o `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade a uma instância desta classe.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: O que <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>inicializa a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>propriedade para uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>classe.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>objeto retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Representa o usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity associated with the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a identidade de segurança associada a <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando você validar um usuário nos serviços de aplicativo cliente, o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>ou o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>define o `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade a uma instância desta classe.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: O que <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>inicializa a propriedade de identidade para uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>classe.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>inicializa a propriedade de identidade para o <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>objeto retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Representa o usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o usuário representado pelo <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref> está na função especificada.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você chamará o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>método o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call this method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode converter o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>valor da propriedade para um <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>referência para chamar esse método explicitamente, conforme demonstrado na seção de exemplo.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsInRole method will always return `false` if the user login has expired.
trans-unit.target: O método IsInRole sempre retornará `false` se o logon do usuário expirou.

trans-unit.source: This will not occur if your application calls the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method one time shortly after authentication.
trans-unit.target: Isso não ocorrerá se o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>método uma vez logo após a autenticação.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application must retrieve user roles at other times, you might want to add code to revalidate users whose login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo deve recuperar funções de usuário em outros momentos, convém adicionar código para revalidar usuários cujo logon expirou.

trans-unit.source: If all valid users are assigned to roles, you can determine whether the login has expired by calling the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os usuários válidos são atribuídos a funções, você pode determinar se o logon expirou chamando o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no roles are returned, the login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma função for retornada, o logon expirou.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this functionality, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo dessa funcionalidade, consulte o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only necessary if you have selected **Require users to log on again whenever the server cookie expires** in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: Essa funcionalidade só é necessária se você selecionou **exigir que os usuários façam logon novamente sempre que o cookie do servidor expira** na configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: configurar serviços de aplicativo cliente](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The role to check.
trans-unit.target: A função para verificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is in the specified role; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the user is not in the specified role or is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o usuário está na função especificada. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o usuário não está na função especificada ou não está autenticado.
